sprawls.name: World Cities
sprawls.meta: Urban agglomerations with a population greater than 100,000.

seamless_town.name: Seamless shopper towns
seamless_town.meta: 100% Seamless UK definitions of natural markets at 4 levels, local, towns, district and region. Close match to true ‘markets’ at multiple scales.

retailpoints.name: Retail Points
retailpoints.meta: Over 10,000 supermarket roof-top locations and addresses. Retailers include Aldi, Asda, Booths, Budgens, Co-op, Costco, Lidl, Marks and Spencer, Morrisons, Sainsbury’s, Tesco, Waitrose, Wholefoods.
